      • cellery.CellularAutomata2D

  • public class TessellationAutomata2
extends CellularAutomata2D
    CellularAutomata2D endowed with Tessellation rules of type 2.
    Author:
    Zach Tidwell

    • Constructor Detail

      • TessellationAutomata2

        public TessellationAutomata2(CellArray2D cells)

      • TessellationAutomata2

        public TessellationAutomata2(CellArray2D cells,
                     int M,
                     int cellDeath)
        Constructs a CellularAutomata2D with Tessellation rules of type 2. Cell death is enabled when cellDeath is equal to 1 and off otherwise. the modulus M controls the frequency of rule changes.
        Parameters:
        cells - the first generation of this
        M - the modulus of this
        cellDeath -

    • Method Detail

      • oddStep

        public int oddStep(int i,
          int j)
        Determines the Cell at the ij-th position the the next generation when step is odd.
        Parameters:
        i - the horizontal position of the cell
        j - the vertical position of the cell
        Returns:
        0 or 1

      • evenStep

        Parameters:

        j - the vertical position of the cell
        Returns:
